god-tier.name: Eldershard, Blade of the Eternal Stars
god-tier.description: A longsword infused with the essence of the cosmos, said to cut through the very fabric of reality.

god-tier.name: Frostfang, Sword of the Eternal Winter
god-tier.description: This blade embodies the chill of winter, freezing foes in their tracks.

heroic.name: Bloodsong, the Whispering Blade
heroic.description: A blade that sings a haunting melody, instilling fear in the hearts of its enemies.

heroic.name: Dawnbringer, Sword of the First Light
heroic.description: Forged from the first light of dawn, this sword banishes darkness and evil.

arcane.name: Stormrend, Blade of Thunder
arcane.description: A sword that crackles with the energy of storms, bringing forth thunder with each strike.

arcane.name: Nightshade, the Shadowed Edge
arcane.description: A blade that blends into the shadows, it strikes without warning.

god-tier.name: Sunsunder, Edge of the Celestial Flame
god-tier.description: A katana forged from the heart of a dying star, wreathed in everlasting flames.

god-tier.name: Voidseeker, Blade of the Abyss
god-tier.description: This katana cuts through both flesh and spirit, seeking the void between worlds.

heroic.name: Moonveil, the Lunar Edge
heroic.description: Forged beneath the light of the full moon, this katana is as swift as moonlight itself.

heroic.name: Windcutter, Blade of the Tempest
heroic.description: With each swing, the katana slices through air and sound, leaving only silence.

arcane.name: Soulreaver, the Ghostly Strike
arcane.description: This katana can cleave through souls, leaving its victims lifeless husks.

arcane.name: Shimmerfang, the Ethereal Edge
arcane.description: A blade that flickers between dimensions, making it impossible to predict its movements.
